name: Tetrunic (SachaSzymo)
description:
Created during a school GameJam, Tetrunic is a coop puzzle game in which you'll have to work with your friend to survive !

Try to build the highest tower using your fishing rods and escape from the swarm of monsters crawling below ! Will you be skilled enough not to bother your allies during your hard task ? 

Platform : PC

Engine : Unity

Number of players : 2-4

School : Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia, Léonard de Vinci.
